src:
Mie Gerobak Enak
5 Mie Ayam Favorit Artis dan Politisi, SBY hingga Nia Ramadhani
05 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Mie ayam favorit artis dan politisi ini wajib disambangi para pencinta mie. Meski tempatnya sederhana, orang-orang terkenal ini selalu mencarinya.Mie ayam jadi makanan favorit banyak orang, tak terkecuali para tokoh terkenal seperti artis dan politisi. Racikan semangkuk mie dengan topping ayam dan sayuran membuat mereka tak kuasa menolak kenikmatannya.Para artis dan politisi ini pun tak segan menyambangi tempat makan kaki lima untuk menyantap mie ayam favorit mereka. Tiap penjual mie ayam sudah memiliki racikan andalan sendiri. Harganya juga relatif masih terjangkau.Para penggemar mie ayam bisa mencoba mie ayam favorit artis dan politisi berikut ini. Mulai dari Nia Ramadhani sampai Megawati, inilah keistimewaan mie ayam pilihan mereka.Baca Juga: 5 Bakso Enak Milik Para Artis, Kamu Sudah Coba? 1. Mie Alip


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: natalia_erlinaDi kawasan Pecenongan, Mie Alip jadi warung mie ayam halal favorit para artis. Misalnya saja Nia Ramadhani dan Iis Dahlia yang pernah bersantap di sini. Mie Alip menawarkan mie ayam dalam pilihan mie tebal atau mie tipis.Harganya mulai dari Rp 32.000, berupa mie ayam dengan tambahan pangsit atau bakso. Racikan mie Alip dilengkapi ayam cincang dan sayur sawi. Untuk baksonya ada pilihan bakso urat yang gurih kenyal. Sedangkan pangsitnya berisi ayam yang sudah dicincang halus.Kalau mau tambah bumbu, tersedia di atas meja berupa daun bawang, tongcay, acar cabai hijau kecil, dan sambal. Mampir ke sini jangan lupa juga cicip bakso goreng yang jadi favorit. Mie Alip buka dari pagi hingga sore hari sehingga bisa jadi pilihan tempat sarapan atau makan siang.2. Mie Ayam Goreng Mekaton


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram mahasiswakulineranPutra bungsu Jokowi, Kaesang Pangarep pernah membuat pengakuan jujur soal mie ayam favoritnya. "GAK PERLU DINILAI, INI RASANYA ENAK BANGET. HARUS COBA." Ia menobatkan Mie Ayam Goreng Mekaton di Sleman, Yogyakarta sebagai favoritnya.Seporsi mie ayam ini dibanderol Rp 10.000 saja. Toppingnya suwiran ayam manis dengan pendamping sawi, mentimun, dan bawang goreng. Tersedia mie ayam biasa dan mie ayam goreng.Banyak orang suka tekstur mie ayam yang tebal dan kenyal di sini. Rasanya manis gurih seperti mie ayam Jawa pada umumnya. Makin enak saat mie ayam ditambahkan topping ceker ayam yang empuk dan gurih.3. Mie Ayam Gondangdia


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram eat.n_huntMie Ayam Gondangdia berlokasi di Jl. Cikini IV No. 12A, Jakarta Pusat. Mie ayam di sini merupakan kesukaan Megawati Soekarnoputri. Berdiri sejak 1968, di sini ada pilihan mie ayam, mie baso, mie pangsit, mie pangsit goreng, dan mie baso pangsit.Harga yang ditawarkan mulai dari Rp 27.000 sampai Rp 45.000. Ciri khas Mie Ayam Gondangdia adalah teksturnya halus dengan potongan daging ayam empuk dan manis. Untuk kuah kaldunya terasa gurih menyegarkan.Selain mie ayam, Mie Ayam Gondangdia juga menawarkan makanan oriental lain. Misalnya saja bihun goreng seafood dan ayam kuluyuk. Tak ketinggalan fuyunghai yang menggugah selera dengan isian daging ayam dan kol.4. Mie Ayam Bakso Yunus


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: dok. detikFoodMenyebut mie ayam favorit selebriti, tak bisa meninggalkan Mie Ayam Bakso Yunus. Warung mie ayam ini adalah langganan Krisdayanti dan Yuni Shara. Lokasinya ada di seberang Pasar Tebet Barat dan sudah ada sejak 1984.Kalau ke sini wajib coba Mie Ayam Yamin Bakso Urat yang dibanderol sekitar Rp 30.000. Tekstur mie-nya kenyal dengan rasa manis gurih yang seimbang. Sementara bakso uratnya disajikan terpisah dengan ukuran cukup besar. Rasa daging sapinya tercecap kuat.Racikan mie Haji Yunus tidak menggunakan MSG atau penyedap rasa. Pelengkapnya ada potongan ayam jamur, daun bawang, dan pangsit goreng renyah. Untuk penyegar dahaga, Mie Ayam Bakso Yunus tawarkan es kelapa muda yang patut dicoba.Mie Ayam Bakso YunusJl. Tebet Barat Dalam Vlll No. 8D, TebetTelepon: 021 70945363Baca Juga: Mie Ayam Bakso Yunus: Mantap! Mie Yamin Bakso Legendaris yang Jadi Favorit Para Selebriti 5. Mie Kondang


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram maemangangemilTerakhir ada Mie Kondang di Jalan Kostrad Raya No. 13, Pesanggrahan yang jadi favorit Megawati Soekarnoputri, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono (SBY), hingga Sutiyoso. Meski merupakan langganan politisi ternama, harga mie ayam di sini terjangkau, mulai dari Rp 14.000 saja.Rasa mie ayam di sini gurih karena memakai bumbu alami seperti bawang merah, bawang putih, dan rempah lainnya. Sudah sejak 1973, racikan mie ayam di sini tersohor. Terlihat potongan ayamnya berwarna cokelat gelap dengan rasa manis meresap. Tambahannya adalah irisan sawi segar.Konon saking sukanya dengan Mie Kondang, SBY pernah memakan mie ini dua kali sehari. Mie Kondang bahkan pernah diminta untuk melayani tamu SBY selama satu bulan jelang pelantikannya di tahun 2004. Tiap hari Mie Kondang disajikan setidaknya sebanyak 500 mangkuk.Simak Video "Mexican Tuna Salad dan Salad Roll yang Segar dan Bikin Sehat"[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)
text:
Delicious Noodle Carts
5 Favorite Chicken Noodles Artists and Politicians, SBY to Nia Ramadhani
05 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - The favorite chicken noodles of artists and politicians must be visited by noodle lovers. Even though the place is simple, these famous people always look for it. Chicken is a favorite food for many people, including famous figures such as artists and politicians. Mixing a bowl of noodles with chicken and vegetable toppings made them unable to refuse their enjoyment. The artists and politicians did not hesitate to visit the street vendors to eat their favorite chicken noodles. Each chicken noodle seller already has its own mainstay mix. The price is also still relatively affordable. Chicken noodle fans can try the following favorite chicken noodles artists and politicians. Starting from Nia Ramadhani to Megawati, this is the specialty of their choice of chicken noodles. Also Read: 5 Tasty Meatballs Belonging to Artists, Have You Tried? 1. Alip Noodles


Photo: Special

Photo: natalia_erlinaIn the Pecenongan area, Mie Alip is the artist's favorite halal chicken noodle shop. For example, Nia Ramadhani and Iis Dahlia who have been dining here. Mie Alip offers chicken noodles in the choice of thick noodles or thin noodles. Prices start from Rp 32,000, in the form of chicken noodles with additional dumplings or meatballs. Alip noodle concoction is equipped with chopped chicken and mustard greens. For the meatball, there is a choice of chewy, spicy meatballs. While the dumplings contain finely chopped chicken. If you want to add seasoning, it is available on the table in the form of leeks, tongcay, small green chili pickles, and chili sauce. Stop by here don't forget to also taste the fried meatballs which are a favorite. Mie Alip is open from morning to evening so it can be a choice of breakfast or lunch. Mekaton Fried Chicken Noodle


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram student of the youngest son of Jokowi, Kaesang Pangarep, once made an honest confession about his favorite chicken noodle. "NO NEED TO BE ASSESSED, THIS IS EXCELLENT. IT'S MUST BE TRY." He named Mekaton Fried Chicken Noodle in Sleman, Yogyakarta as his favorite. This chicken noodle dish is priced at Rp 10,000. Topping shredded sweet chicken with a companion mustard greens, cucumbers, and fried onions. Available ordinary chicken noodles and fried chicken noodles. Many people like the texture of thick and chewy chicken noodles here. It tastes sweet like Javanese chicken noodles in general. The more delicious when chicken noodles are added topping a soft and tasty chicken feet.3. Gondangdia Chicken Noodle


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram eat.n_huntMie Ayam Gondangdia is located on Jl. Cikini IV No. 12A, Jakarta Pusat. Chicken noodles here are Megawati Soekarnoputri's favorite. Founded in 1968, here is a choice of chicken noodles, meatball noodles, dumpling noodles, fried dumpling noodles, and dumpling meatball noodles. Prices offered start from Rp. 27,000 to Rp. 45,000. The special feature of Gondangdia Chicken Noodle is its smooth texture with tender and sweet pieces of chicken meat. For the broth the broth tastes refreshing. Besides the chicken noodle, Gondangdia Chicken Noodle also offers other oriental foods. For example, fried rice vermicelli and chicken Kuluyuk. Do not miss fuyunghai that arouse the appetite with stuffing chicken and cabbage.4. Yunus Meatballs Chicken Noodle


Photo: Special

Photo: dock. detikFood Calling celebrity favorite chicken noodles, can not leave Yunus Meatballs Chicken Noodle. This chicken noodle shop is a subscription of Krisdayanti and Yuni Shara. The location is opposite the Tebet Barat Market and has been around since 1984. If you come here you must try the Chicken Noodle Yamin Meatball which is priced around Rp. 30,000. The texture of the noodles is chewy with a balanced sweet savory taste. While the vein meatballs are served separately with a size large enough. The taste of beef is tasted strongly. The Haji Yunus noodle mixture does not use MSG or flavor enhancers. Complete with chopped mushroom chicken, leeks, and crispy fried dumplings. For thirst fresheners, Yunus Meatballs Chicken Noodle offers young coconut ice which is worth a try. Yunus Meatballs Chicken Noodle. Tebet Barat Dalam Vlll No. 8D, TebetPhone: 021 70945363 Also Read: Yunus Bakso Chicken Noodle: Great! Legendary Meatball Yamin Noodles the Favorite of Celebrities 5. Famous Noodles


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram maemangangemilLast there is a Kondang Noodle on Jalan Kostrad Raya No. 13, Pesanggrahan which is a favorite of Megawati Sukarnoputri, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono (SBY), and Sutiyoso. Although it is a subscription to well-known politicians, the price of chicken noodles here is affordable, starting from Rp. 14,000. The taste of chicken noodles here is tasty because it uses natural herbs such as onions, garlic, and other spices. Since 1973, the chicken noodle concoction here is famous. Seen pieces of chicken are dark brown with a sweet, pervasive taste. The addition is sliced fresh mustard greens. The konon was so happy with Kondang Noodle, SBY had eaten this noodles twice a day. Kondang Noodles have even been asked to serve SBY guests for one month prior to his inauguration in 2004. Every day Kondang Noodles are served at least 500 bowls. Watch the video "Mexican Tuna Salad and Salad Roll that is Fresh and Healthy" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] ( adr / odi)
